ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Wow...
ygData.msgSnippet: Some people are hoping that Lucasarts involvement in the Star Wars product may end up with a better product with better customer support.  I hope they re right
ygData.messageBody:
Some people are hoping that Lucasarts involvement in the Star Wars product
may end up with a better product with better customer support. I hope
they're right - but I also hoped that the weren't going to get the "Broken
as intended" response to lullaby testing...

As far as EQ2 - by the time it comes out Anarchy Online, and Horizons will
hopefully be out. So, no, it's not a forgone conclusion that my EQ friends
will be rushing to buy EQ2....

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: Monday, September 11, 2000 1:07 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Wow...


Fortunately most of my friends agree on this, so they won't be all that
interested in EQ2 either. I have no desire to try Star Wars Online, or to
play another Verant game. They have the worst customer service I have ever
seen and an even worse attitude towards their customers.

Kit
